title: Fitness isn't going to sell me on Apple's new AR/VR headset. Here's why
description: Reality Pro will need a killer feature to justify its rumored $3,000 price tag. For me, workouts and fitness apps aren’t it.

title: Every Apple product we're expecting at WWDC on Monday: AR/VR headset, Mac Studio, more
description: With a weekend left before WWDC, here's what's expected from Apple during its annual developer conference.

title: I tested this tiny satellite communicator on an off-grid adventure. Here's my verdict
description: The smartphone has given us that feeling of being in constant contact with the rest of the world, no matter where we are. But what happens when you venture off-grid?
